scripts.clean:rn: rm -rf /tmp/metro-* && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-*
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && cd ios/ && pod install && pod update && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean:rn && npm run clean:ios && npm run clean:android
